Articles.Content:
You should make a cargo boat that can carry a 50 ton weight and 10000 units of ore from the ksc to the old airfield and back at least at 20 m/s (for a boat this is stupid fast in real life). 

Rules:

1)no f12 menu

2)no mods(not even MechJeb)

3) speed must be constant 

4)no refuel missions or ISRU system usage 

5)stay in water the second you get I in it(no seaplanes)

6)jets only

7)no glitch abuse(no k drives or Danny planet breakers allowed)

Speed scoring 

0-5: third credit

5-15: half credit

15-20:3/4 credit

20+:full credit

I realize that an IRL boat moving 20 m/s is very fast (it's like 40 knots), but due to KSP water drag physics, aquatic vehicles can easily go supersonic. You might want to make some other restriction besides speed.
